channel.title: Students on Thomas de Graaff

item.title: Promotion Zhiling Wang
item.description: Promotion and defense ceremony of Zhiling Wang My second Ph.D. student got her Ph.D. degree! With an almost flawless defense and a very good Ph.D. thesis Zhiling obviously deserves all the credit. However, I could not resist to post this picture. Somehow, I resemble Jose Mourinho, the angry looking football trainer. At the promotion of Zhiling Wang
